Pre-Game Insights: Sacramento finished 46-36 overall and 30-22 in Western Conference play a season ago. The Kings averaged 116.6 points per game while shooting 47.7% from the field and 36.6% from behind the arc last season.
Los Angeles went 51-31 overall, 9-7 in Pacific Division games and 26-15 on the road a season ago. The Clippers gave up 112.3 points per game while committing 18.5 fouls last season.

INJURIES: Kings: Devin Carter: out (shoulder), Kevin Huerter: day to day (illness), Orlando Robinson: out (mcl). Clippers: Mo Bamba: out (knee), P.J. Tucker: out (personal), Kawhi Leonard: out (knee).
